DOC.brief_summary: This study measure dynamic real-time IOP anterior chamber standard phacoemulsification surgery . What known : - Fluidics control determine one primary driver physician decision make choose phacoemulsification equipment . - Active pressure system fluidic control perceive possibly real ( base upon recent literature ) improvement intra-cameral IOP stability reduce pressure fluctuation . - Improved fluidics allow reduce dynamic IOP fluctuation , in-the-bag position phaco tip , intra-cameral fluid flow likely improve corneal health post-operatively .
DOC.brief_title: Intra-surgical Evaluation CATS Tonometer Prism Abbott Medical Optics Versus Alcon Phacoemulsification Machines
DOC.criteria: • Age 18 great Bilateral cataract phacoemulsification extraction posterior IOL implantation plan eye Subjects able give inform consent Nuclear Sclerotic cataract grade 2+ 3+ Naturally dilate pupil size ( dim light ) > 4.0 mm ( dilation medication ) eye Preoperative corneal astigmatism 2.5 D less Ages 55 80 Availability , willingness , sufficient cognitive awareness comply examination procedure • Uncontrolled systemic disease opinion Investigator would put subject 's heath risk Intraoperative complication Subjects one functional eye Those one eye poor eccentric fixation Mild severe cataract , predominantly posterior subcapsular cataract High corneal astigmatism ( i.e . eye display oval contact image ) Those corneal scar corneal surgery include corneal laser surgery Microphthalmos Buphthalmos Severe Dry eye Blepharospasm Nystagmus Keratoconus Any corneal conjunctival pathology infection . Central corneal thickness great 0,600 mm less 0,500 mm ( 2 standard deviation human mean ) Acute chronic disease illness would increase risk confound study result ( e.g . diabetes mellitus , immunocompromised , etc . ) Uncontrolled systemic ocular disease History ocular trauma prior ocular surgery Fuchs Dystrophy Subjects may expect require retinal laser treatment surgical intervention , include LRI 's Capsule zonular abnormality may affect postoperative centration tilt lens ( e.g . pseudoexfoliation syndrome ) Pupil abnormality ( nonreactive , tonic pupil , abnormally shape pupil , pupil dilate least 4.0 mm mesopic/scotopic condition ) Contact lens usage within 6 month PMMA contact lenses , 1 month gas permeable lens 1 week extendedwear dailywear soft contact lens
